/* collab.todo.myTaskCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) TotCnt , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus = 'W' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) WaitCnt , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus = 'P' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) ProcCnt , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus = 'H' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) HoldCnt , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus = 'C' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) CompCnt , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus != 'C' AND b.Label = 'E' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) EmgCnt , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus != 'C' AND b.ImpLevel = 'H' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) LvlHCnt , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus != 'C' AND b.ImpLevel = 'M' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) LvlMCnt , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus != 'C' AND b.ImpLevel = 'L' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) LvlLCnt , IFNULL(SUM(case when (b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')) and b.TaskStatus != 'C' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) NowForCnt , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.TaskStatus != 'C' AND (b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')) then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) DelayCnt , IFNULL(SUM(case when (b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')) and b.TaskStatus != 'C' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) NowNoCnt , IFNULL(SUM(case when (b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')) and b.TaskStatus = 'C' then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) NowCompCnt , IFNULL(SUM(case when b.EndDate is null or b.EndDate <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) NowTotCnt , IFNULL(SUM(case when b.ObjectType ='EVENT' AND b.EndDate = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') then 1 ELSE 0 END ),0) SchCnt , IFNULL(SUM(case when b.ObjectType ='APROVAL' AND b.EndDate = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') then 1 ELSE 0 END ),0) AprCnt FROM collab_task_member a JOIN collab_task b ON a.taskSeq = b.TaskSeq WHERE A.UserCode = #{USERID} AND b.parentkey=0

/* collab.todo.getMyFavorite */ SELECT tf.UserCode, t.TaskSeq, t.TaskName FROM covi_smart4j.collab_task_favorite tf JOIN covi_smart4j.collab_task t on tf.taskSeq = t.taskSeq JOIN collab_task_member A on A.TaskSeq = t.TaskSeq AND A.UserCode = tf.userCode WHERE tf.userCode = #{USERID} ORDER BY tf.RegisteDate DESC LIMIT 8
/* collab.todo.tag */ SELECT TagSeq ,TagType ,TagName ,TagData FROM collab_tag WHERE IsDisplay = 'Y'
